Stop-loss strategy: Sell when DBR exceeds 65% or ROE drops below 10%
Sell when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price, or when the ROE and ROA both decline for two consecutive years.
Trigger a sell order when the stock price falls by 15% from the current price.
If the stock price falls by more than 15% or if the DBR increases by more than 10%, trigger a sell order.
